item.description:
Herb Pearce will be leading a fun, interesting and informative workshop about communication. This workshop is designed for couples but single people are also welcome to attend. Here is a description from Herb:

”Herb has been teaching relationship communication courses for 30 years. Even though most communication is affected by personality more than gender, gender differences play a major role. Herb will present information from his life and work and also based on a very revealing book "We Have to Talk" by Samuel Shem and Janet Surrey, a Cambridge couple. We will also have a gender dialogue in the group after the information is presented. Don't miss this special event! .”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring or share our own food as long as it is vegetarian.
item.name: Gender Dialogues - Effective Ways for Men and Women to Communicate
